Class CrowsFlightTransferGenerator

Generates walks between transport stops, solely based on the distance between them.

Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

CrowsFlightTransferGenerator(TransitDb, Int32, Single)

Generates a walk constructor.

A walk will only be generated between two locations iff:

  • The given locations are not the same
  • The given locations are no more then 'maxDistance' away from each other.

The time needed for this transfer is calculated based on

  • the distance between the two locations and
  • the speed parameter
Declaration
public CrowsFlightTransferGenerator(TransitDb transitDb, int maxDistance = 500, float speed = 1.4F)
Parameters
Type Name Description
TransitDb transitDb
System.Int32 maxDistance

The maximum walkable distance in meter
System.Single speed

In meter per second. According to Wikipedia, about 1.4m/s is preferred average
